items.sentence: Don\'t you want to get back together with Tom?
I kind of wished you\'d mentioned that before.
I knew Tom wouldn\'t have the courage to quit.
I knew Tom wouldn\'t like the way Mary danced.
Would you do that again if you had the chance?
Who do you think is a better cook, you or Tom?
Who do you think is going to get married next?
Who do you think will be at the meeting today?
I don\'t think I got a good grade on the exam.
Tom didn\'t have the courage to speak to Mary.
I think this is the best restaurant in Boston.
I can\'t wake Tom up no matter how hard I try.
I certainly can\'t do that as well as you can.
Tom won\'t admit it, but he\'s in big trouble.
I\'ve read several books about serial killers.
I\'m going to Australia to study architecture.
I\'m going to be helping Tom paint his garage.
It doesn\'t sound to me like you want to talk.
Tom needs to find a job to support his family.
Tom never asked me to show him how to do that.
